name: THIS WAS YOUR IDEA
description:
Welcome to THIS WAS YOUR IDEA, a survival horror experiment powered by your suggestions. 

The only concrete detail is the genre; everything else in the game is based entirely on your ideas.

Let's answer some questions.

Q: What is this?
A: That's for you to know, and for me to figure out. Q: Is anyone allowed to suggest an idea for this game?
A: Absolutely! Q: Will this game be free? And when can I play it?
A: This experiment will be free forever, and you can play it at any stage in its development. I'm putting out devlogs occasionally showing the game's progress.

Subscribe to see the dev-logs!
-tumblewed
